title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 9-2.2 - Required Signage Warning Against the Dangers of Illegal Products
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 9-2.2 - Required Signage Warning Against the Dangers of Illegal Products

State Regulations

Any person operating a place of business wherein e-cigarettes or e-liquids are sold or offered for sale shall post in a conspicuous place a sign, to be published by the Department, that warns against the dangers of using illegal e-cigarette and e-liquid products. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
9-2.2

Adopted

New

York State Register February 5, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 05, eff. 2/5/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
